Name: Ghetto Conspiracy
About the game: New retro point and click Players control a young wannabe-rapper named Lucas, who drinks too much at a party one night and awakens to find his friends Camille and Tony are missing. You soon discover that Camille has been taken by the local crime boss because of a debt you owe. But even that is nothing compared to 'the terrible reptilian conspiracy' at play in the secret shadows of Cheesytown. ° Inspired by old point and clicks ° Frame by Frame animations °More than 40 scenes and 30 characters
